titles: Miles Christianus or A iust apologie of all necessarie writings and writers specialie of them which by their labored writings take paines to build vp the Church of Christ in this age and in a publique, and diffamatorie epistle lately set forth in print, are vniustly depraued. Allowed by auctority.
author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
Mosse, Miles, fl. 1580-1614. aut
Mosse, Miles, fl. 1580-1614. Short catechism. aut
publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be sold at his shop, right ouer against the great South doore of Pauls,
notes: A reply to the prefatory epistle to: Mosse, Miles.  A short catechism.
Running title reads: A iust apologie of bookes and writinges.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
